phrases: My dream was to make it big with my band
and have everyone in Japan know my name.
Even if it meant that one person would never call my name again.
Yeah, yeah Yeah, yeah
Yeah, yeah, keep going on
Baby I am standing alone
An unforgettable rainy day
Chasing after your shadow
And it is over, it is like sand now
I sigh every night
I scream like a child and cried
It hangs there quietly, my sorrow
Please, please God, forgive my sins
I do not need to hide no more
Flowing toward the turquoise light
Just keep going on
You have got the chance now
You have got the power
Know you got to be so true to yourself
I show you my life now
I show you my love now
I show you my everything yeah yeah
You would better change now You would better catch now
Do not ever change so be yourself
I will show you my strength now
I will show you my love now
I will show you my everything yeah yeah
Baby do not be afraid
Yeah, yeah Yeah, yeah
Yeah, yeah, keep going on
Yeah, yeah Yeah, yeah
Yeah, yeah, keep going on
Our rehearsal is from twelve of the clock for one hour.
1700 SOUND CHECK 1800 RUN-THROUGH 1945 STAND-BY FOR ON AIR
Our rehearsal is from twelve of the clock for one hour.
If you are hungry,
you would better eat a box lunch while you have the chance.
You still have thirty minutes.
Hey, what is this run-through at six?
It is a dress rehearsal.
You do the exact same thing as you will live.
There is a lot of time between the rehearsal and the run-through.
Do we have other work during that time?
Today, there is just this music show.
It is your first time on live TV, is not it?
Focus, and get yourself geared up for it.
What?!
Then can we go out before the run-through?
Did you even listen to what I said?
Focus, I said, focus.
I am about to pass out from lack of sleep.
And I cannot relax here.
Okay.
That was good.
Yasu!
Yay!
How've you been?
You are always so loud, even on the job.
Traitor.
Women are so scary.
They can be so vindictive.
Hey, Ren.
I need to talk to you.
What?
Just come with me.
Ren, are you still?
No, I am okay.
No, you are not!
Your eyes say so!
It is just a little...
A little what?
It will never become a habit.
It already has, and you have got to stop!
Sorry.
I will never do it again, so...
Ren...
Do not worry.
I am not going to steal Nana from you.
I did not think so.
You have always let me have whatever I want since long ago.
It pisses me off that you are looking down on me.
Whenever you are not with Nana, you become unstable like that!
And it is the same with Nana!
Nana, too?
She is been hyperventilating.
If this continues, who knows how she will end up.
I realized it through that incident with Takumi and Nana.
She is probably quite traumatized from being abandoned by her mom.
You are not suited for this industry.
I really regret encouraging you to come to Tokyo.
Do not push yourself, Ren.
You are not like Takumi or me.
Stop trying to reason it out and just do as you wish.
If you keep forcing things, you are not going to last long.
Shadow of Love is so great, no matter how many times I listen to it.
Tonight's show will be a good promo,
and I am sure the initial stock of the CDs will sell out right away.
You think so?
I think the sales department is overestimating
by putting out 800,000 singles at once.
Do not blame me if they are stuck with a bunch of left-over CDs.
By the way, how many is BLAST putting out?
I am not sure.
Given all the publicity they are getting, they might break a million.
But I cannot imagine Gaia putting out 800,000 copies of a single
for a new band with no track record.
We will hit number one on the charts for sure.
You are right!
You think so?
If I were Gaia, I would make that gamble.
One million copies on the first release.
I know it is not my business, but it is kind of thrilling.
THRILLING?
But if it tanks, that would be a tremendous loss!
They have already spent hundreds of millions of yen
in promoting them.
That is exactly why.
They have come this far.
Now they have to recoup that investment.
If they release more singles than us
and become number one with their first release,
then the party continues.
We are living in a time where popular things sell.
If there is a pile of CDs from a new band that is just topped the charts,
you are going to buy it purely out of curiosity.
Okay.
Thank you very much!
Hey, Ginpei, can I go out until the run-through?
You are being persistent.
Is it to see a woman?
I do not have one.
Women are evil.
Ginpei, the car key...
Are you feeling all right, Shin?
I could find you a vacant dressing room for you to sleep in.
No.
I would feel more relaxed in the car.
Are not you being nicer to Shin than to me, Ginpei?
Do not come to wake me up until it is time.
That kid has no stamina for his age.
I would say you have got too much, Ginpei.
Nana, you should return to your dressing room
and also take a nap while you have a moment.
Yeah.
I have my own private room,
so maybe I can relax and get a little sleep.
COME ON!
COME ON!
Want To sleep with me?
Enough of that.
ENOUGH OF THAT...
ENOUGH OF THAT...
Where is Nana going?
ENOUGH OF THAT...
To her private room to take a nap.
How come girls get their own rooms?
Because they are evil?
What do you mean, enough of that?
We have not done anything yet.
But how does Yasu manage to stay completely harmless?
He is like a Buddhist priest who is transcended earthly desires.
Could that mean his love for me is more like love between siblings?
TRAPNEST MISS REIRA
But Yasu's a guy.
And all guys get horny.
I wonder if he jerks off to Yuri.
BLACK STONES MISS NANA
I have neglected Ren for a month,
so he is got to be sleeping with other women by now.
Not that I care.
I would actually be relieved.
Good work.
What are you doing here?
House-sitting.
Oh, I took a cigarette.
Leaving your stuff around with the door unlocked is unsafe.
There are dangerous people out there who will enter uninvited.
I agree!
What if someone sees you here?!
Get out!
Do not be so upset.
I am sorry that I neglected you for a whole month.
No, I am not mad.
After all, I am just as guilty for that.
I have to... end it.
This style of dating...
to meet occasionally and talk to each other, making love,
like we are in some cool love drama...
It just will not work for us.
If we cannot always be together, it would be easier to just end it.
I am sure Ren feels the same way.
Nana.
I have something to talk to you about.
Do you have time?
I prepared myself...
but I am scared.
RE: DO YOU HAVE TIME?
I HAVE AN INTERVIEW FROM 3:00.
BUT I HAVE AT LEAST TWO HOURS.
LET ME KNOW WHEN YOU ARE DONE REHEARSING AND I WILL HEAD OVER.
That was fast.
I was hiding behind the car.
I just could not wait.
This Volkswagen bus is so cute!
It stands out, so I found it right away.
You are so lucky to get to ride in this every day.
Actually I think it is a problem to have our car stand out.
But the glass is tinted, so no one can see in, right?
So we can do anything.
What do you have in mind?
What do you want to do, Reira?
Look each other in the eye and talk without pretense.
Let me do what you want to do, Shin.
Huh?
What I want to do?
I am no longer your client.
But doing what an adolescent boy wants to do
is not much different from what we have been doing.
There is no point then.
I will quietly listen to anything you want to talk about.
But there is a difference between doing it for someone
and having it done for you.
Why do not you sit?
No, not that one.
Over here.
What is wrong with this one?
We are not going to be making out when we are having this conversation, are we?
Well... that is up to you.
What is it?
Ren's lost some weight.
I wonder if he is been eating properly.
Nana...
What is it?!
Just say it!
I feel like I could suffocate and die!
Marry me.
What is going on?
A drama?
A drama?
Who is in it?
What are you doing here?
Do not you have rehearsal?
Is that supposed to be a disguise?
It actually makes you stand out more.
I got a little time off,
so I wanted to come and see how you look as an actress.
I am just an extra.
That bank employee uniform looks good on you.
You look so grown-up.
I kind of feel that...
you have been trying to make a move on me since this morning.
No!
I did not mean to...
Well, maybe a little...
Do not tease grown-ups.
No, wait!
I may look like a kid, but I am twenty years old!
Really?
I thought you were probably still in high school.
I will be 21 in three months.
January?
What day?
The 23rd.
Then you are an Aquarius.
Yep!
All the guys in my band are Aquarius.
You are a Virgo, right?
Born on September 12, blood type A.
My blood type's A, too.
You look like you are in your teens, but you are 22, right?
I was surprised when I saw your profile at the agency.
But if we were in school, we would only be one grade apart.
That is what my profile says.
Huh?
How old are you really?
Twenty-seven.
Do not be so obviously shocked.
I am sorry.
It is fine.
I am used to it.
Now get back to work.
Yes...
VACANT CAR
METER RUNNING
METER RUNNING
It is over.
There is no way someone seven years older would pay any attention to me.
Age aside, she probably thinks she cannot depend on me.
So you want to be supported by these frail arms.
Yes.
Totally.
It is impossible.
When I was a child, I thought no one would ever love me.
So that winter back when I was sixteen and got involved with Ren,
I thought I was having the most unbelievably happy dream.
It did not feel real.
Shin...
It is my birthday next week.
Happy birthday!
There is nothing happy about it!
I will be 23!
I will be an old lady!
That is still young.
But I will be eight years older than you.
Still seven years.
My birthday's next week, too.
I will be sixteen.
Huh?
What day?
November 1st. Scorpio, blood type AB.
We are the same!
Really?
It is the red string of fate!
But you do not believe in fate, right?
I believe it now.
To be loved by the man I love...
To me, that was a miracle.
I thought we were destined to be together.
Nana...
Will you?
Again?
You are such a pervert.
No, that is not what I am talking about.
Will you marry me?
Impossible.
If you will not, I will die.
Then go ahead and die!
When I die, I am bringing you with me.
Then kill me.
He nearly did kill me.
And then he took me to heaven with him.
I guess I am a pervert too.
You are looking much better, Nana.
Were you able to get some sleep?
Shut up, baldy!
Just shut up!
- What are you upset about? - Because you did not want to do it with me,
- I ended up doing it with Ren again.
- Well, Nana's rage is usually irrational.
SIGH - I ended up doing it with Ren again.
- Well, Nana's rage is usually irrational.
And that idiot totally got carried away.
I COMPLETELY BLACKED OUT
And that idiot totally got carried away.
I SERIOUSLY ALMOST DIED
And that idiot totally got carried away.
I SERIOUSLY ALMOST DIED
I SERIOUSLY ALMOST DIED I definitely will not marry him.
I SERIOUSLY ALMOST DIED
I SERIOUSLY ALMOST DIED
She probably looks better because of the makeup.
She probably looks better because of the makeup.
That is Mika's great technique!
I think it is the pheromones.
That is Ren's technique.
I saw Ren leave Nana's dressing room.
That was a bold move to do it right in your dressing room.
YOU BEAT ME
That was a bold move to do it right in your dressing room.
That was a bold move to do it right in your dressing room.
- It was not! -
That is good news.
What is so good about it, baldy?!
GOOD NEWS?!
What is so good about it, baldy?!
There is no need to hide it.
All of us staff know the two of you are truly lovey-dovey.
We are not lovey-dovey at all!
He snuck in without my permission!
Nana.
Ren may try to act cool,
but he is no different from how he was as a kid.
Be a little kinder to him, will you?
Please.
I see...
Yasu is harmless not because he is achieved enlightenment,
or because he sees me as his little sister.
Yasu!
It is simply because...
I am Ren's woman.
Why did not I ever notice something so obvious before?
This is like a class reunion!
Lots of coincidences, right?
The reason Yasu sacrifices himself...
- to protect me, - You did this on purpose,
- is so he can support Ren, - using us as bait!
- who cannot take action himself.
You just wanted to see me, right?!
Yasu's bond with Ren is much stronger
than the one he has with me.
Because they have been together since Ren was born.
In the same orphanage.
My last ray of hope has been severed.
No one can save me from the pain...
of drowning in Ren's love.
It is a destiny I cannot escape.
Yo, Nobu.
You doing okay?
Y-Yes.
How does this guy manage to throw people in hell
ENTER
How does this guy manage to throw people in hell
ENTER just by being there?
His existence itself is evil.
This guy's definitely the Demon Lord.
- Long time no see, Nobu. -
Your woman is totally weird.
And you too, Shin.
How've you been?
It is been a while, Reira.
There she is.
Reira in person.
She has finally made her appearance.
We finally perform on the same stage.
STARE
STARE
And she is looking at me.
She is coming!
She is coming.
She is coming.
She is coming!
Glad to meet you, Nana!
I am Reira of Trapnest!
I hope we get along!
Okay!
LOST THE WILL TO FIGHT Okay!
LOST THE WILL TO FIGHT
LOST THE WILL TO FIGHT I cannot underestimate this woman.
LOST THE WILL TO FIGHT
What a huge TV!
I coaxed him for the biggest one, and he got it for me.
I also rearranged the room.
Do not you think you are going a little overboard with everything?
You do realize how spoiled you are, do not you?
That is not true!
He is being really strict with me.
He tells me if I do not behave,
he will not blow-dry my hair after I take a bath.
Dry it yourself!
I wish eight of the clock would come around quickly.
There is still another two hours!
Time passes whether you want it to or not.
In the meantime, are not you hungry?
Let us order delivery.
If you do not mind salad and spaghetti, I can make that right away.
I made lots of tomato sauce with the tomatoes from your place.
Wow.
You have become quite an expert in cooking.
You used to be the expert in falling in love at first sight.
Mhm.
It turns out I really enjoy it.
My nausea's subsided,
so I may just attend cooking class and become a real expert.
Seeing that you have found something you are good at,
I guess it was worthwhile coming to Tokyo, after all.
But if I had lived alone,
I probably would have never learned to cook much.
I would not have the urge to cook anything special for myself.
Yeah, I know what you mean.
I guess I like cooking for people and having them enjoy it.
I can feel that even I am of use in some way.
On top of that,
Nana would always use way too much seasoning in her cooking,
so I ended up cooking almost every day.
So naturally, I got better at it.
I mean, that much sodium cannot be good for your health.
Then, I guess it is all thanks to the guru, huh?
Huh?
Nana's also the one who brought you and Takumi together, right?
You have been telling me all kinds of stuff, but you know,
I have never seen you so happy, Nana.
I think you finally have both feet on the ground.
I am relieved.
- Hey, Hachi.
Back then... -
Here are your positions for the opening.
Everyone, please come forward.
I was full of deep regret for introducing you to Takumi.
But, if you are still with him now, and you are happy,
that makes me feel better.
It is my only ray of hope.
Will you hold me now?
Hold me now?
My frozen heart
Kiss my lips and maybe
you can take me to your world for now
I cannot be alone right now
Will you hold me now?
Hold me now?
My frozen heart
I am lost in a deep winter sleep
I cannot seem to find my way out alone
Can you wake me
